title: Changing ping sounds?
body: I have a very hard time concentrating on the default ping sounds and I was wondering if it were possible to customize them in the game files?

replies.body: As of right now, we don't have any way for you to customize the ping sounds in game. We don't support changing any of the game files themselves, since that could cause corrupted files and cause your game to become unstable.

Will you consider adding this function?
I know it's a rare pet peeve but i'm not the only one.
It's something we might look at in the future, but we don't have any plans for this as of right now.
